text: Atrivim Senakerip uaghan akɨnafariba osira Ikiavɨra Itir God, Israelian God dɨpofi. Akɨnafarir kaba, mɨgɨrɨgɨar kaba iti, “Kɨ kantrin igharazibav sozima, men aseba men akurazɨ, me na abɨrazir puvatɨ. Ezɨ kamaghɨra, Hesekian God uaghan nan dafarim da, uan gumazamizibar akuraghan kogham. Bar puvatɨgham.”
